output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: YES - Contains "CMF 11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: YES - Directly mentions Marcel Ciolacu, a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: YES - It's a paid advertisement with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: YES - Explicitly asks for votes for Marcel Ciolacu ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte") 5. Journalism: NO - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion: NO - This is structured campaign messaging with a clear call to action
This is a clear case of electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly calls for votes for a presidential candidate - Contains campaign messaging and electoral promises - Has a CMF number - Is being run as paid advertising - Is targeting a large audience (100,001-500,000 estimated reach)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is definitely electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit call to vote for Marcel Ciolacu - Has official campaign elements (CMF number) - Is paid advertising - Large reach and targeting - Clear electoral messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala (post-ul Facebook ID 1559839654674397) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul promoveaza explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU la functia de președinte, continand indemnuri directe la vot ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte în această duminică"), fiind difuzat ca reclama platita pe Facebook dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea include numar CMF (11240017), confirmand natura sa de material electoral, si are un impact semnificativ, atingand intre 10,000 si 14,999 de persoane.
